# Bureau (Building)
## Overview
**Bureau**

**Create** 55 Goods, 6 Influence, 52 Labor, 1 Magic (2,420 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Book Repository (Room)|Book Repository]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 4 [[Office (Room)|Offices]], 2 Scriptoriums, 1 [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Room]], 2 [[Storage (Room)|Storages]]

A large warren of offices for clerks and record-keepers working for a guild or government.
